items.name: RSM Product Sales LLC
items.description:
RSM is a leading U.S. provider of assurance, tax and consulting services focused on the middle market. Combine that with our Microsoft partnership, and we’re uniquely qualified to understand your business challenges and provide you with the highest quality of integrated technology solutions. 

As your trusted Microsoft advisor, we will ensure that you receive the highest level of service in the areas of management consulting, business applications, infrastructure, mobility and cloud services. We understand the challenges of middle market companies and our deep industry focus enables us to leverage industry trends and best practices

With more than 8,000 people in 80 U.S. cities and access to more than 32,000 people in 120 countries through our membership in RSM International, we can meet your needs wherever in the world you do business.

Our recognitions include:

•  Member of the Microsoft Dynamics President’s Club
•  Member of Microsoft Dynamics Inner Circle 
•  2013 & 2014 Central Region SMB Partner of the Year
•  Microsoft Cloud Deployment Partner
•  Ranked First on Accounting Technology's VAR 100 List
•  Accounting Technology Killer VAR - RSM was profiled as a ‘not so traditional’ Killer VAR
•  Bob Scott’s Insights’ VAR Stars

Our alignment with the business is supported by depth and breadth of technology capability in designing, architecting, building, deploying, managing and supporting online and on-premises solutions as:

•  Office 365
•  Dynamics 365 Enterprise edition (formerly Dynamics AX and Dynamics CRM)
•  Dynamics 365 Business edition
•  Dynamics ERP (Dynamics AX, Dynamics GP, Dynamics NAV, Dynamics SL)
•  SharePoint 
•  Windows Virtualization and Management
•  Azure and Identity Management
•  System Management and Windows Intune
•  Windows Devices and Mobility
•  Unified Communications via Lync 
•  Business Intelligence based on SQL Server and Excel

RSM also provides Private Cloud hosting services built on Microsoft Hyper-V. 

Experience the power of being understood.®

items.name: Associated Computer Systems LTD
items.description:
Technology can be daunting, with so many vendors, innovations, and nuances to navigate through. You need a partner with expertise and experience to guide you through the process of researching, selecting, and implementing new solutions. You need a compass to direct you toward the right solution. ACS' mission is to safely navigate you through technology simply and efficiently. We are your technology compass.

Since 1980, ACS has proudly offered our clients the latest technology innovations. There are no “off-the-shelf” solutions - we focus on functional requirements and needed efficiency rather than specific platforms. This allows us to lead you to more creative, relevant solutions by choosing from a wide variety of hardware and operating systems that no one else considers or offers.

ACS’ commitment to technology and providing our clients with the highest level of service and technical knowledge can be seen in the over 40 certifications that our staff has collectively attained through world-leading technology companies such as: 

- Microsoft
- IBM
- Cisco
- Lenovo
- Hewlett Packard Enterprise
- Dell EMC
- VMware
- Tableau
- Tegile
- Varonis
- Veeam
- EVault

To learn more about how ACS can help your company increase revenue, mitigate risk, and reduce cost, contact our Trusted Technology Advisors today. 

contact@acsltd.com
1 (855) 723-3628

items.name: Compliance IT Solutions LLC
items.description: Compliance IT Solutions specializes in managing the move to take advantage of the easy to deploy and manage Cloud Services offered in the marketplace today. These Cloud offerings allow your business to grow and expand without the costs and complexity of years past. These services can be started with minimal costs and commitments and can easily scale to meet the most demanding needs of E-Commerce and the IT industry. Compliance IT Solutions also specializes in managing the daunting tasks required in taking the older legacy data and migrating this data into the platform that will allow your business to continue to grow. Our professional staff has years of experience dealing with email migrations involving many of the Legacy Archive solutions found in the market today

items.name: INNOVATIVE SYSTEMS INC
items.description: ISI's staff has over 75 years combined experience in the field of Information Technology. We are a Microsoft Gold Certified Partner. Our members are committed to continuing education and providing your company with the latest technology solutions. We stay on the forefront of new technology so that we will be ready, when you are ready to move forward. We are here for you today, and will continue to be here with you tomorrow.

items.name: TeraCloud, Inc.
items.description:
Managed Cloud Solutions from TeraCloud | Your OnRamp to the Cloud!

TeraCloud is a National Cloud Solutions Provider delivering innovative public, private and hybrid services to organizations throughout the United States. Our headquarters is located in Dallas Texas, with field offices located around the country. We have a unique approach to IT, and it starts with our team. Our company culture is customer focused, and any solution we deliver must solve an underlying business need that improves your efficiency and enables your growth and success.

items.name: CrystalTech Web Hosting, Inc.
items.description: Newtek Technology Solutions (NASDAQ: NEWT) is a leading managed technology provider that helps businesses leverage the security, cost, and performance benefits of cloud computing and modern business technologies. With a global footprint of eleven data centers, specialized experience in security and compliance, and a staff of certified engineers, Newtek can help any-sized organization achieve its IT objectives.

items.name: Computer Integration Technologies Inc.
items.description: At CIT, our focus on people, hardware, software, technology, and the future makes I.T. work for everyone. We provide a one stop solution for all things I.T. We’re the partner you can rely on to keep your technology up-to-date and up-to-speed. We know which technologies will help you grow your business and which ones are just a costly distraction. Our focus is to cut through the clutter and provide you with tailor-made solutions designed for your business and your processes.

items.name: Arctic Information Technology, Inc.
items.description:
Arctic Information Technology (Arctic IT) is a 100% Native-Owned Enterprise that provides business applications and network management for three distinct verticals:  Tribal Government and Enterprise, Federal and the Alaska SMB market.  For over 16 years, our team has been recognized as a uniquely talented team by Microsoft as an industry leader and we’ve been repeatedly recognized as the top managed services provider in Alaska. 

Tribal. Arctic IT developed a proprietary business application, Tribal Platforms™ Tribal Enrollment. It is designed to enhance every facet of member management. Built on the Microsoft Dynamics platform, this application allows each tribal department access to information from one source.  The member’s PHI stays compliant because each department has access to only the information they need.  Most importantly, the member doesn’t have to fill out additional forms each time they are served by a department. 

Federal. Arctic IT’s experienced team has the background to help manage finances, human resources, citizen relationships, funds and grants, and service delivery—all with a low total cost of ownership. Every day, our solutions are used by government organizations to provide more effective services with greater accountability.

Managed Services.  We’re proud to be working with small to medium-sized businesses in this space and have been recognized as the leading provider of managed services in Alaska for the past two years.  The value of TotalCare goes well beyond your typical IT partnership, and provides the peace-of-mind every business owner needs to have in the changing environment.

items.name: Cenetric, Inc.
items.description:
Cenetric IT Services is a locally owned and operated full service IT provider. Based in Olathe, KS Cenetric services  business and  Nonprofit organizations. Our clients range from small businesses to Fortune 500's, to a locally based Regional restaurant franchise where we support the Corporate Office and restaurants in addition to a variety of other businesses in the Kansas City Metro area. 

Cenetric IT Services specializes in Managed IT Services which allows us to service our clients IT needs into a customized package for their specific business. Our flat monthly fee allows our clients to budget a fixed amount each month for IT services, with Cenetric there are no overages, no hourly rates and no additional costs. We provide unlimited support, both remote help desk support and on-site support. As part of our all in one service we insure that our clients network is secured, backed up and healthy every day. Cenetric IT Services takes a proactive approach to IT services, with the use of our remote agents we are able to remotely monitor a network, identify issues before they become problems and resolve those issues quickly and efficiently with as little inconvenience as possible for our clients. Cenetric IT works with all of our clients as a virtual CIO, helping to plan out expansion, procurement of new hardware and software and future IT costs, we work hard to become a part of our clients business and a trusted advisor. 

For nearly 10 years Cenetric has been a client focused IT Service provider where we live by our company motto- “Our Mission is to Further Your Mission”

items.name: beiNVENTiV
items.description:
beiNVENTiV is a Colorado based IT company that provides small to mid-sized companies with a full IT “department” for a fraction of the cost of building an internal IT department.  
We provide everything from a basic helpdesk to expert CIO consultation.  Look to us for guidance on what technology would be best for you today and as your company grows.  We implement technology solutions and maintain them for you.  Our clients choose either:
•	A pay-as-you-go experience 
•	Fixed price projects, whichever you prefer.  
Our clients also use our team to supplement and extend their existing internal IT department.
beiNVENTiV has in-depth technical expertise with solutions such as Office 365, SharePoint, Microsoft CRM (Dynamics 365 for Sales/Customer Service/Field Service, etc..) and cloud solutions.  In addition, we provide custom development services, website devlopment and provide IT Assessments.  We also have a solution set for Private Equity firms.

items.name: Sagiss, LLC
items.description: For over 20 years, Sagiss has been providing managed IT services to small and mid-sized businesses in the North Texas area. On premise, in the Cloud, and anything in between--Sagiss can customize its solutions and services to meet your needs.

items.name: Prototype IT
items.description: We provide best-in-class technological solutions and IT services to businesses throughout the Dallas Fort Worth area and across the country. We specialize in consultancy, project management, technical solutions, and managed IT services. We can help you with one-off projects, implementing the latest technology, providing recommendations and resources, or managing your day-to-day technical operations.

items.name: VALCOM COMPUTER CENTER
items.description: VLCM, a Microsoft Gold Partner, is a leading technology reseller in the Rocky Mountain West. VLCM brings technology into the business planning process to align our customers’ vision with the right technologies and professional services. With a team of more than 25 engineers, we assess, plan, implement, and service critical business technologies to help you Get IT Right.

items.name: MB Consulting Group, Inc.
items.description: Midwest Managed Services Provider for cloud and infrastructure solutions

items.name: Csi, L.L.C.
items.description: We have over 20 years of experience in understanding, installing and providing service on hardware, software and networks.  CSI works hard at being the best in our IT field. That means getting and keeping key industry certifications, attaining and beating our Service Level Agreements with our customers, and working seamlessly with our hardware and software partners (Dell, Cisco, Avreo, Cyberscience, Privaplan, Eizo, Konica-Minolta and more). We’ve been fortunate enough to have that hard work recognized by the Industry: we are CISCO Certified, have Microsoft Certified technicians and engineers, A Dell Premier Provider, and one of Ingram Micro’s Top 500 Fastest Growing SMB Partners in the U.S. Just recently, we were named “Best in Sioux City For IT, 2014” (nothing like home-town recognition!)

items.name: Intelegain Technologies
items.description:
Intelegain Technologies is a global technology and innovation company, having offices in Dallas, Mumbai, Singapore, Dubai and Sydney having over 18 years of technology consulting experience and servicing 1000+ customers in 25 countries. Intelegain has a broad portfolio of services including Cloud Management, Mobile & Web, Analytics Solutions, Custom Software Development, Project Management.

Solutions from Intelegain include;

•	Mobile & Web App Development
        Creating cutting edge and innovate mobile and web apps on iOS, Android, Xamarin and ASP.NET 
        platforms

•	Cloud Services - Azure & AWS
        Cloud Migration, Consumption & Billing Optimization, Blob Storage, Queue Storage, Table Storage

•	Application & Systems Integration
        Enabling existing or legacy applications to “talk” to other applications and integrate web based 
        features into older desktop applications.

•	Enterprise Services - MS Dynamics CRM/NAV/AX, SAP Hanna
        Helping businesses implement and manage the entire supply chain, automate and optimize core 
        operational functions

•	User Experience (UX)
        Increasing customer interaction with the product/app/solution through an engaging User Experience

•	Office 365 Solutions/Subscriptions
        Defining risks, challenges & complexities, Migrate existing collaboration, Migration to O365, 
        Sharepoint

•	Custom Product/App Development
        Creating customised software products using Agile SDLC on Microsoft stack.

address.addressLine1: North Dallas Business Centre 3010 LBJ Freeway

items.name: Thinkspace It
items.description: ThinkSpace IT focuses on a creative approach to technology so we can help our customers get the most out of their solutions.  With a proven record of satisfied customers across varied hardware and software platforms, we are highly qualified to meet all of your IT infrastructure needs.  Our extensive partner network includes Google, Intel, HP, Xerox, and Microsoft, which allows us to provide best in class IT Solutions, Cloud Hosting and IT Support Services.

items.name: Data-Smart Computers
items.description: Specializing in helping small and medium business succeed through the use of innovative technology solutions.

items.name: Losh Communications, Inc
items.description: Since we began installing business phone systems in 1990, Losh Communications has a long history of providing telecommunications services to Southwest Missouri Businesses. Today, as Losh Network Services we bring that long history of excellence to all of our services and products to a full suite of Information Technology Services.

items.name: Symmetrix Technologies, Llc.
items.description:
We're experts with both local networks and cloud technologies. We've been helping small and medium sized companies in the Dallas/Fort Worth area build, enhance and maintain their IT infrastructures since 2003.

Move your IT operations to a modern, predictable flat-rate support plan and use your valuable time to focus on running your business.  We'll cover everything for you - including rapid problem resolution and ongoing preventative maintenance. You get the advantages of an entire IT team taking care of your network infrastructure without needing a dedicated employee!

Our Enhanced Office 365 bundle improves the world-class suite of Microsoft Office 365 products by adding permanent email and data backup, encrypted email, control of corporate data on mobile devices and an extra layer of spam filtering.

We've also tailored Office 365 specifically for the needs of law firms by adding information rights management, data loss prevention, automatic court deadlines in calendars and integration with STI's PracticeMaster and Tabs3 legal software.
